DependsOn: Component, ImagingLevel3Segments_id, Filename, ImagingLevel2 Key, ImagingLevel3Image Key, Image Segmentation Data Type, Image Parameter file, Software and Version, Image Object Class, Image Object Class Description, Image Number of Objects

Description: A unique identifier used by schematic for record updates and as a reference key in other schemas.
Specifies how the segmentation is stored
Valid Values: Mask, Outline, Polygon, Probability Map, Point

Description: Path in Synapse to a text file listing algorithm version numbers and relevant parameters needed to reproduce the analysis
Defines the structure that the mask delineates
Valid Values: nucleus, cytoplasm, plasma membrane, whole cell, spot, other

Description: The number of objects (eg cells) described
If Imaging Object Class is "Other", please use this field to provide a text description of the imaging object class associated with the segmentation data
